summary: I AM TAKING MY 2001 TOYOTA SEQUOIA FOR THE 4TH TIME TO HAVE THE ROTORS WORKED ON.  THE FIRST TWO TIMES, THEY JUST TURNED THEM.  THE THIRD TIME, THEY REPLACED THEM.  THIS TIME THEY ARE REPLACING THEM.  THE TRUCK ONLY HAS 28,000 MILES ON IT AND I BELIEVE THIS IS EXCESSIVE FOR A NEW VEHICLE THAT I DRIVE VERY CAREFULLY.
